title: Residential Luxury House Located In Panadura.
details:
Beautifully Designed Almost Brand New Two Storied House built to the highest quality, situated in Hirana with an amazing view, closed to Panadura (4km) and to the highway entrance, 8km (Gelanigama Interchange). The House is built on a 15 Perch Land and a floor area of 1,500 Sq. Ft.
Calm and peaceful residential area with many public & private institutions within few minus drive (Leading Super Markets, Government & International Schools, Religious).
